Author: rainbowraptor16
Text: Idk about me... but for you I'd suggest googling counselors that specialize in ED's around you. Join a support group if there is one nearby. Find online support groups for recovery, maybe, those can be quite triggering though. Talking to a friend might help. Oh, and throw away your scale if you haven't already, and any ED related apps you may have on your phone.

Author: Azaryxe
Text: Speaking to your doctor is a good first step. If they don't take you seriously, see another doctor. You can even ask reception if there is a doctor with mental health experience and that you'd prefer to see them.  It's not gonna be an easy road, but I'm rooting for you.
